long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Review faster, understand better.

Review.legal is your AI legal assistant that will take your legal document and:

- Remove legal jargon
- Simplify clauses
- Shorten long paragraphs

This tool is built for everyone, whether you're reviewing a business contract, signing a rental agreement, looking at mortgage papers - review.legal can help save you time and effort.

With review.legal, you no longer have to open new tabs and Google unfamiliar terms or concepts every time you come across something complicated. Just ask review.legal, and get a concise, clear explanation right away.

Visit our website www.review.legal to shorten and simplify full legal documents
